#!/bin/bash #
GID=`grep lmwriter: /etc/group` if [ "$GID" != "" ] ; then chgrp lmwriter /opt/lifemapper/LmCompute/config/config*.ini chmod g+ws /opt/lifemapper/LmCompute/config/config*.ini fi
/sbin/ldconfig /opt/lifemapper/bin/confSysvals
rm -rf /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-99-lifemapper
